Built and implemented socket server for real time data. Developed chatbot using botpress(open source) and Google Dialogflow

work.title: Co-founder and technical team lead
work.description: Built a mobile rescue app along with my colleagues at I/O Developers called 'Kerala Rescue' and helped rescue 50+ stranded people from their flooded homes in 2018 Kerala floods. Built a post disaster web portal 'ForMyKerala' in association with goonj where we helped in the distribution of the supplies provided by goonj to the needful people. Worked in a team to Build school management mobile app and dashboard for a client based in GCC.
